Class AsyncLoggerConfig.RootLogger

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable, LifeCycle
    Enclosing class:
    AsyncLoggerConfig

    @Plugin(name="asyncRoot",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
public static class AsyncLoggerConfig.RootLogger
extends LoggerConfig
    An asynchronous root Logger.
